Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1968...
Injured on 6/10/1968 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1971, off Bill Graham (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1971, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 6/22/1971...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1971, hitting .339 with 6 HR, 63 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/5/1973 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/23/1975...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 7/27/1975...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/2/1975...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 4/13/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 7/14/1976...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1977, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
